attributes.action: Force employers to respond to every application for employment with an acknowledgment and a result of the application.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is the height of rudeness that an employer can invite applications for employment, then fail to acknowledge receipt of the application or even bother to inform the applicant that they have not been considered.

As an 'older' job applicant this is particularly annoying and leads one to suppose that one is rejected on age grounds, and then completely ignored!
